title: Chris Hughes and Jesy Nelson share cuteness overload as they cycle and play Jenga together
text:

Chris Hughes and his beau Jesy Nelson sent fans into meltdown on a romantic cycle and game of Jenga together on Friday following her attempted suicide bid.

The pair were all smiles after the release of Jesy's latest documentary which highlighted the effects of trolling, as they sat on bikes in a garden posing for pictures.

Linking arms with boyfriend Chris, the Little Mix star was glowing with happiness in a black zip up jumper with a khaki puffa jacket completed with a pair of shades.

Meanwhile Chris was wearing a pair of grey jogging bottoms and cap, with a black North Face coat.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Their romantic fun-filled day started off with a cycle together in Jesy's "favourite place to be" with Chris, followed by a chilled evening involving Jenga and food.

It seems that they are just like every other couple, showing off what they really get up to in the evenings.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Their bike ride took place in the Cotswolds in Bourton, as Chris showed off the beautiful views of green fields and village houses.

He didn't shy away from showing off girlfriend Jesy on social media, as his whole Instagram story featured photos and videos of her.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Chris and Jesy looked cosy by a fire, accompanied by two dogs as they began their game, which Love Island star Chris was filming.

Later in the evening, Jesy stripped down to her pyjamas and fluffy socks to play the game, and her hunky boyfriend changed into a comfy jumper.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Their game finished as Jesy pulled out one of the wooden blocks and the tower toppled over.

The songstress has come a long way since she revealed she attempted suicide following online abuse.

(Image: Instagram)

On her documentary she said: "It doesn’t matter if you are in the public eye or not you can’t get away from social media and it is ruining people’s lives.

"We all need to talk more on how this is making us feel."
description: The pair are more loved up than ever and taking fans every step of the way through their romance
